channel.title: My Go Journey on Health and Nutrition Tips
channel.description: Recent content in My Go Journey on Health and Nutrition Tips

item.title: Losing Belly Fat After Pregnancy
item.description: It’s completely typical to acquire a decent lot of weight during pregnancy. This overabundance weight isn’t anything to stress over, and really, guarantees the solid advancement of your child. Notwithstanding, when your pregnancy is over it’s likewise entirely ordinary to need to lose infant tummy fat, and lose it as quick as could be expected.

item.title: Easy Belly Fat Free Exercises
item.description: In the event that you need to lose stomach fat, practice with a solidness ball. This $20 piece of wellness hardware, which is accessible at most outdoor supplies or retail chains, might be the critical fixing as you continued looking for a level stomach or washboard abs. Scientists at Sacramento State University in California found that individuals who worked out with security sheets had double the muscle strands in their stomachs contrasted with individuals who did crunches alone.

item.title: The Best Back Pain Exercises and Stretches
item.description: According to this research, Lower back pain affects 60%–80% of adults in Western countries at one time or another. The common cause of this Lower back pain is Prolonged periods of sitting, often in today’s office environment. But did you know that you can prevent low back pain by doing these simple exercises every day after you wake up in the morning:

item.title: Immune System Booster Beverage with Turmeric Tea
item.description: Curcuma longa is a rhizomatous perennial herb that belongs to the family Zingiberaceae, native to South Asia and is commonly known as turmeric. It is used as herbal remedy due to the prevalent belief that the plant has medical properties. Curcuma longa possesses different effects such as antioxidant, anti-tumor, antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory, wound healing, and gastroprotective activities.

item.title: Boost Your Immune System with Ginger Tea
item.description: Ginger has previously been reported to have antiinflammatory (45), antioxidant (46), and antithrombotic (47) effects. It also reported in Ayurvedic and Tibb systems of medicine to be useful in rheumatic disorders. Seven patients suffering from such disorders reported relief in pain and associated symptoms on ginger administration. But did you know that Ginger can also boost your immune system.

item.title: Avocado Tomato Salad
item.description: We will show you this easy recipe for your breakfast using fresh avocados Ingredients 1 avocado, diced 1 cup cherry tomato (200 g), finely chopped ¼ medium red onion, thinly sliced ½ lime, juiced salt, to taste 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped Preparation Combine all ingredients in a bowl and gently stir to combine.

item.title: Healthy Dinner Blueberry Crisp
item.description: Blueberry is rich in bioactive substances and possesses powerful antioxidant potential, which can protect against oxidant-induced and inflammatory cell damage and cytotoxicity. According this research, blueberry also good for person with cardiovascular disease (CVD) and type 2 diabetes. Blueberry-supplemented diet can prevent obesity-induced insulin resistance by improving insulin sensitivity and protecting pancreatic β-cells.

item.title: How to Cure Back Pain at Home In 3 Easy Steps
item.description: According to this research, Lower back pain affects 60%–80% of adults in Western countries at one time or another. The common cause of this Lower back pain is Prolonged periods of sitting, often in today’s office environment. This have been linked to bad posture, poor circulation, and neck strain Low back pain normally gets better on its own within a few days or weeks.

item.title: 7 Best Teas for Losing Weight and Protect Your Body
item.description: The next time you pop in to your favorite coffee bar, consider skipping the pumpkin-spice lattes, caramel macchiatos, and cold-brew iced coffees; instead, go for a soothing, steaming cup of tea. Because in addition to tea’s well-known power to soothe sore throats and even help prevent cancer and diabetes, it could actually help you drop a few pounds.
